name: Joggle Knight
description:
The weary knight grows tired of slaying monsters and exploring dungeons. He's always had one dream job that he wants to be a professional at, joggling.  Play as the knight practicing his horrid joggling skills. Survive for as long as you can dodging all the weapons that he's juggled.

Controls:
WASD - Player Movement
Enter - Start/Restart

Assets used: 0x72 DungeonTilesetII.
Music by SmartPoetic.
